data.title: Units 1 - 6 Discovery Way, Horam, East Sussex, TN21 0GE
data.meta_description: A brand new high-quality business park under construction offering a total of 6 industrial units with first-floor mezzanine workspaces. The unit...
data.text:
A brand new high-quality business park under construction offering a total of 6 industrial units with first-floor mezzanine workspaces. The units are under construction and are located in the heart of Horam Village on the A267 adjacent Horam Park Caravan site and Merrydown Village, the newly built residential scheme in place of the former Merrydown Cider Brewery. Construction is well underway.

Next to the industrial units is a standalone two storey office development also available to let.

Unit No Ground Mezzanine Total Rent p.a. Business Type Status 1 1,130 770 1,900 Industrial Let 2 770 363 1,133 £7,950 Industrial Under Offer 3 770 363 1,133 £7,950 Industrial Under Offer 4 830 470 1,300 £9,750 Industrial Under Offer 5 1,429 825 2,254 £14,250 Industrial Under Offer 6 1,429 825 2,254 £14,250 Industrial Under Offer Total 6,358 3,616 9,974

Situated on the western side of Little London Road just south of the junction with the B2203 Heathfield Road, approximately 5 miles north of Hailsham and the A22 and 2 miles south of Heathfield. Horam is a rapidly growing village with various new housing developments underway. The village high street benefits from all the usual conveniences and services.

** Please note – if using a Sat Nav the site might be found using TN21 0JB as the postcode **
